name: Soccer Champions 2018
description:
Play the Soccer Champions 2018! Score the winning goal with the hero of your national team and win the Russia championship 2018.

Soccer Champions 2018: Russia championship Game enables you to enter in a real time football game environment. If you are succeed to score a goal your coach will celebrate with the spectators of the match. You will get fame for the ultimate game of championship Russia. Roll, pass, dribble, shoot and kick for goal to become a soccer hero. Your fans are ambitiously waiting to see you in action. Use all the tactics to dodge your opponent players to reach other teams polls. Here one of the famous bicycle kick can be made to create a hype in the crowd.

You have never seen a Soccer game like that. Compete against rivals from all over the championship and play with your friends, fight for your country to win the cup and get unique and exclusive REWARDS! In this soccer game we premiere NEW shooting mode, paint with your finger the shot of foul or penalty, and you will see a SPECTACULAR shot on goal, with exclusive soccer animations of REAL soccer shots. If you are precise scoring free-kicks and penalties ... you will be the winner of the 2018 Soccer championship!

With an easy, simple and addictive football game mechanic, Soccer Champions 2018: Russia championship Game offers you infinite fun and a feeling of authentic competitive football!
